channel.title: Adding new skills
channel.description:
Ok so ive added two new skills which are summoning and hunting, also the client sided part. So when you train hunt, everytime the addskillxp code is used it disconects me from game. the skill id is 22 & 23.
How can i make it so instead of disconecting me, it can just update the levels without logging me out?

item.title: Adding new skills
item.dc:creator: @Dragon_Noobs Dragon Noobs
item.description:
